entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OnNavigatedTo being called twice when Navigating to Modal page #18688
  • Add NuGet publishing step/gate for Manifest packages #18687
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Cannot retrieve larger string from SecureStorage #18685
  • [iOS] canvas.GetStringSize() is not consistent with actual string size in GraphicsView #18679
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D12 #18675
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D11 #18673
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Incorrect Rendering of Gradient Color on iOS and macOS when Clipping Custom View #18671
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Permissions.RequestAsync<Permissions.Sensors> does not return a value on iOS16+ #18669
    Backlog
  • RadioButton disabled UI issue - iOS #18668
    Backlog
  • Creating .NET MAUI App project in onedrive results in error #18666
    Backlog

Closed

  • Publish Unpackaged Apps Error(Project Reference MAUI Library ) #9064
  • Can't run unit tests with MAUI and net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0 #18268
  • Skia graphics default font change bug. #18497
  • MAUI - Android App crashes when using a custom scheme URL to resume with a Frame and Entry #18362
  • [Enhancement] Wifi Adapter Controls #18612
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Issue when using BindableLayout and Entry/Editor #15937
    Under Consideration
  • [iOS] canvas.GetStringSize() not considering newlines #18572

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix Flyout toolbar #18684
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Switch` #18682
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Slider` #18681
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [C] implicit style VSM do not override Manual value #18680
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D12 #18677
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D11 #18676
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fixed Editor placeholder position based on alignment #18672
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-editor
  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leak in `ImageButton` #18602
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Stepper` #18663
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-stepper, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 8.0.0-preview.23472.1 to 8.0.0-preview1.23165.1 #18593
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix PlatformStringSizeService on iOS/Catalyst to use correct API #18621
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.7.2 to 17.8.0 #18641
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Only use custom image sizing with ImageButtons #18521
    area/controls 🎮
  • Arrange content based on arrangement bounds rather than viewport bounds #18586
    area/layout 🔲
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.3 to 3.14.0 #18601
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
